titleStmt.title: Three sermons preached 1. In Whitehall, March 29. being the first Tuesday after the departure of King Iames into blessednesse. 2. In Christs Church, at the trienniall visitation of the right Reuerend Father in God, the Lord Bishop of London. 3. In the chappell by Guildhall, at the solemne election of the Right Honourable the Lord Maior of London. / By Tho: Adams.
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

titleStmt.title: Three sermons preached 1. In Whitehall, March 29. being the first Tuesday after the departure of King Iames into blessednesse. 2. In Christs Church, at the trienniall visitation of the right Reuerend Father in God, the Lord Bishop of London. 3. In the chappell by Guildhall, at the solemne election of the Right Honourable the Lord Maior of London. / By Tho: Adams.
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Matthewes, and Iohn Norton,

notesStmt.note: "A sermon preached at the trienniall visitation of the Right Reuerend Father in God, the Lord Bishop of London, in Christ-Church" and "The holy choice" each have separate dated title page, the former on E2v; pagination and register are continuous.
"The holy choice" identified as STC 123 at reel 1163:4.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library and Harvard University. Library.
Appears at reel 1163 (Folger Shakespeare Library, "The holy choice" only) and at reel 1699 (Harvard University Library copy).
